node.sku: SKUE1221
node.description:
Amazon Redshift is a fast and powerful, fully managed, petabyte-scale data warehouse service in the cloud. Customers can start small for just $0.25 per hour with no commitments or upfront costs and scale to a petabyte or more for $1,000 per terabyte per year, less than a tenth of most other data warehousing solutions.
Traditional data warehouses require significant time and resource to administer, especially for large datasets. In addition, the financial cost associated with building, maintaining, and growing self-managed, on-premise data warehouses is very high. Amazon Redshift not only significantly lowers the cost of a data warehouse, but also makes it easy to analyze large amounts of data very quickly.
Amazon Redshift gives you fast querying capabilities over structured data using familiar SQL-based clients and business intelligence (BI) tools using standard ODBC and JDBC connections. Queries are distributed and parallelized across multiple physical resources. You can easily scale an Amazon Redshift data warehouse up or down with a few clicks in the AWS Management Console or with a single API call. Amazon Redshift automatically patches and backs up your data warehouse, storing the backups for a user-defined retention period. Amazon Redshift uses replication and continuous backups to enhance availability and improve data durability and can automatically recover from component and node failures. In addition, Amazon Redshift supports Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC), SSL, AES-256 encryption and Hardware Security Modules (HSMs) to protect your data in transit and at rest.
As with all Amazon Web Services, there are no up-front investments required, and you pay only for the resources you use. Amazon Redshift lets you pay as you go. You can even try Amazon Redshift for free.

node.description:
The Plantronics Marque 2 headset, a perfect companion for smartphones, now features DeepSleep power-saving mode and dual microphones that reduce noise and wind for clear, crisp call quality. You can also listen to music or stream audio and Internet radio, and you can manage your calls without pressing buttons– just say "Answer" or "Ignore." With more ways to enhance your conversation, the Marque 2 makes it easier to enjoy being hands free. Feature: Dual microphones reduce noise and wind, giving you better call quality. DeepSleep power-saving mode helps keep your headset ready when you forget it in the car, at your desk, or around the house. Just say "Answer" or "Ignore" to handle your calls – no buttons to press. Three sizes of flexible silicone eartips (S, M, L) and an optional earloop provide a comfortable, stable fit Use your headset to listen to music, movies, Internet radio, and driving directions. Headset battery meter for iPhone and iPad. Specification : Size (LWH): 1.94 inches, 0.55 inches, 0.36 inches Weight: 0.32 ounces

node.description:
Product Description

Talking over the phone for long hours can be very hectic and annoying. Doesn't matter whether your phone is expensive or branded, after a certain point of time, it starts heating up. In order to prevent any such circumstances so that you can enjoy interrupted talking over the phone, Platronics has come up with the wonderful Plantronics Voyager Edge Bluetooth Headset with Charge Case (Black). This innovative and stylish product from Platronics is bound to leave you stunned.

The super glossy and compact body is the major attraction. The headset has a 4.0 Bluetooth connectivity option which can help connect with any Android and iOS phone. Burdened with free apps and a powerful portable charger, this Platronics headset is a complete head turner. The charger gives 16 hours of talk-time (including 6 hours of headset hours). The soft silicon eartips provides immense comfort to your ears. Easy voice instructions, alerts and LED indicator make the job easier, hence if you want to get rid of the messy cable headsets that tend to get entangled and make you feel tired of talking on your mobile, then order it online today.

Features at a Glance:

  • Cancels all background noise
  • stylish and sleek design
  • ergonomically designed for longer use
  • easy to use
  • 6 hours talk-time
  • Bluetooth connectivity
  • Connects with your bluetooth device
  • comfortable to wear throughout the day
  • crystal clear HD voice clarity
  • easy on/off buttons
  • soft and comfortable silicon eartips
  • 3 changeable eartips, S/M/L
  • free Platronics apps for Android and iOS
  • Contact synchronizer
  • Voice calling
  • Comes with a portable charger with 10 hours of additional talktime
  • Alerts for recharging
  • LED indicator
  • Manages Calendars, reminders and schedules through your Smartphone
  • Comes with a portable charger, car charger, silicon eartips, start-up guide and USB cable

 

From the Manufacturer

Sound Your Best, Wherever You Are

Your non-stop life keeps you on the move. You answer a call in the car, keep talking out on the street, and say your goodbyes while leaving the coffee shop—and you expect to sound your best everywhere. The Plantronics Voyager Edge Bluetooth headset reliably eliminates unwanted noise with three precisely tuned microphones and enhanced noise canceling, optimizing your voice so your caller hears you, not your surroundings. Additionally, this headset is ready for wideband audio, making it compatible with smartphones enabled for HD Voice.

The Voyager Edge in black (view larger).
Carry the Conversation, Not the Phone

Voyager Edge packs in responsive features to let you answer calls, use voice commands, and hear important status notifications without even looking at your phone. Smart sensor technology senses when the headset is being worn so it can automatically answer calls as you place the headset on your ear or redirect audio to your phone when you set down your headset. Voyager Edge syncs to your contacts, telling you who's calling before you answer and voice commands make call management easy—simply say "Answer" to take the call, or "Ignore" to send it to voicemail. Now your "phone hand" can carry a latte, greet someone, or open a door.

Performance and power to keep your conversation going (view larger).
Stay Connected Longer

Be ready when life calls. Using the portable, wireless charging case to top up your Voyager Edge between calls will keep you powered throughout your day by giving you up to 10 additional hours of talk time. Status alerts announce when it's time to recharge, but if at any time you're curious, use a voice command to hear remaining talk time, visually check battery status on your smartphone, or dock your Voyager Edge in its case and tap the touch-sensitive icons to see the meter LEDs light up.

Fully charged case gives your Voyager Edge up to 16 hours of talk time (view larger).
Enhanced by Free Plantronics Apps

Simplify your communication experience with a variety of free apps from Plantronics for both iOS and Android devices.

If you misplace your Voyager Edge use the Plantronics Find MyHeadset app to send an audible tone to help you locate your nearby headset. If it's out of Bluetooth range or powered off, you can use the Backtrack activity log to map where it was last in use.

To help you sort through your busy workday, the Plantronics InstantMeeting app automatically identifies conference calls and dialing details from your calendar, reminds you just before the meeting is scheduled to begin, and with one touch connects you to your conference call—no need to pull over and toggle between screens to find all those numbers and access codes.

What's in the Box

Voyager Edge headset, charging case with rechargeable battery, car charger and micro USB cable, silicone eartips (S, M, L), clip-on earloop, quick start guide

Voyager Edge Bluetooth Wireless Headset

At a Glance
  • Signature Plantronics audio technology eliminates disruptive background noise
  • Charging case enables up to 16 hours talk time (up to 6 hours without case)
  • Responsive sensors automatically answer calls as you place headset on your ear
  • Take calls without pressing a button—hear Caller ID then say "Answer"
  • Tap and pair with NFC-enabled smartphones
  • Choose the language for voice alerts and commands
  • Stream music, directions, and more from smartphones or tablets
  • Connect two devices and answer calls from whichever one rings
  • Enhanced voice clarity from Bluetooth 4.0 with wideband audio support for use with HD Voice-enabled smartphones
  • Update firmware and personalize settings online using the Plantronics MyHeadset Updater tool at plantronics.com

Designed for your non-stop life
(view larger).

node.sku: Pigeon All in One Super Cooker Outer Lid - Red 3 L Press
node.description:
Key Features of Pigeon All in One Super Cooker Outer Lid - Red 3 L Pressure Cooker

  • Metal Spoon Friendly
  • Scratch Resistant
  • Durable
  • Ceramic Coating
  • User Friendly Short Handles
 

Pigeon All in One Super Cooker Outer Lid - Red 3 L Pressure Cooker (Induction Bottom, Aluminium) Price: Rs. 1,950

Cook like a professional with the Pigeon All in One Super Cooker that is uniquely designed to help you cook faster and more efficiently.

Metal Spoon Friendly

The cook and serve pressure cooker is metal spoon friendly thus you can use a metal spoon to stir the food in it.

Scratch Resistant

The 3 L cooker is available in vibrant red and is scratch resistant.

Durable

Made from premium aluminium, the cooker is durable and easy to use.

Ceramic Coating

Equipped with ceramic coating, the pressure cooker is induction cook-top compatible and gives you a residue free cooking.

User Friendly Short Handles

The cooker comes with user-friendly short handles on either side which make handling the cookware easy and comfortable.

Pigeon All in One Super Cooker Outer Lid - Black 3 L Pressure Cooker (Induction Bottom, Aluminium) Price: Rs. 1,749

Inspired by traditional Indian cooking, this All in One Super Cooker in a handi style ensures quality performance in the kitchen.

Scratch Resistant

Being scratch-resistant, this black cooker is safe to use with other metal utensils.

User-friendly Short Handles

The user-friendly short Bakelite handles does not conduct heat and enable easy handling while shifting the utensil off the stove.

Ceramic Coating

Finished with ceramic coating, this Pigeon All in One Super Cooker ensures superior non-stick performance.

Durable

The cooker is made using the finest aluminium material while the lids are made from food grade stainless steel material for lasting durability and performance.

node.sku: Usha Janome Wonder Stitch 80-Watt Sewing Machine(White/Blue)
node.description:
Product Description

Product Description

Lightweight and Easy to Carry

If you like doing your own stitching work, embroidery and likes at home, then the Usha Janome Wonder Stitch is the machine for you. This Usha sewing machine is compact and lightweight and doesn't consume much space. You can carry it without any difficulty owing to its small size and light body and it is perfect for home use. The Usha Janome Wonder Stitch sewing machine is a fully automatic zig zag machine that guarantees durability and performance. All in all, it is a fast and powerful sewing machine that makes minimal noise and gives you perfect results.

Attractive Features and Multifunctional Use

This wonder machine from Usha is endowed with various features that ensures hassle free and easy stitching. It comes with an inbuilt needle threader, needle cutter and a triple strength stitch that aims at perfection and strong stitching. It eases your work as you don't need any physical effort as its fully automatic and you just have to set the functions or patterns that you want and it delivers it to perfection. This portable sewing machine provides you with a variety of choices that help you achieve your sewing target and get satisfaction for the same.

  • Brand: Usha
  • Type: Sewing machine
  • Colour: White
  • Sewing Speed: 860rpm
  • Needle Threading: Automatic
  • Additional Features: 34 stitch functions, separate attachment for button holing, two dials for pattern and stitch length selection, drop feed mechanism, twin needle capability and four step button holing
 

From the Manufacturer

Free Arm Automatic Zig - Zag Machine
This machine is an automatic zig zag sewing machines with a built-in needle threader, triple strength stitch and a free arm for circular stitching. It also has four step button holing and stretch stitching.

Stitch functions
This machine has 14 built–in-stitches and 7 applications of which the main ones are - stretch stitching, four step button holing, button fixing, rolled hemming, blind stitch hemming, zip fixing.

Light weight
This machine is lightweight and comes with a carrying handle.

Pattern selection
This machine has a colour coded functional face plate and two dials for pattern and stitch length selection.

Bed type
This is a free arm machine which allows for circular stitching.

node.name: Dream Maker 60 Sewing Machine (White)
node.short_description:
Product Description

 

Usha Janome Computerized Sewing Machine Dream Maker 60 with Japanese Technology. 60 In-built designs. Top loading full rotary hook bobbin. Manual thread tension control. One hand needle threader. 7 piece feed dog. Start/stop button. Locking stitch button. Variable speed control. Memorized needle up/down. Back lit LCD screen with easy navigation keys. Maximum stitch width of 7mm vs 5mm of other machines. Automatic thread cutter at just a press of a button.

node.sku: Timex B303 Classic Analog Watch - For Women
node.description:
Timex B303 Classic Analog Watch - For Women 

When dressing formally, watches are probably the best way to complement the clothes you wear. The analog Timex Classic watch for women aims to be the one accessory that goes with your formal trousers and tucked in shirts during the week as well as with those elegant party dresses you wear when you’re out painting the town red.

Body and Design

The Classic series watch from Timex features a round dial that is housed in a gold plated case. The case is an integral part of the watch as it protects the delicate movement and mechanism of the watch from the harsh outside world. The analog women’s watch from Timex also features a stainless steel back case to protect it from various corrosive elements present in the environment.

The analog Classic series watch is equipped with a stainless steel strap that is extremely comfortable to wear irrespective of how unbearable the weather is outside.

Functions and Other Features

The women’s analog watch from the Classic series of Timex features a water resistant depth of up to 30 m. This feature would certainly be a watch saver if ever you’re caught out in the rain without your trusty umbrella. The analog Timex watch for women from the Classic series is the perfect accessory to sport whether you’re at a business meeting at work or partying with friends at the fanciest clubs over the weekend.

node.sku: Timex BU17 Empera Analog Watch - For Men
node.description:
Timex BU17 Empera Analog Watch - For Men Price: Rs. 2,595

The simplicity of the old-style timepieces combines with the technological finesse of the modern time telling devices in the Empera collection from Timex to provide users with a joyous experience. The perfect accessory to pump up your fashion quotient, the Timex Empera series oozes grace and exquisiteness.

This Timex Empera Analog Watch for men is crafted to be a head turner, and never fails to make a lasting impression on the minds of curious onlookers at some party. The quartz time wear can be worn with formal attire, and will win you a string of new admirers.

Body and Design

Sporting a charismatic look, the Timex timepiece decorates your wrist, adding an aura of gravity to your appearance. The rectangular dial adds a tinge of glamour to the stylish design of the men’s watch. The regal hues of the watch hands and the dark shades of the dial make this timepiece a coveted accessory. Additionally, the presence of amineral glass cover on the dial makes the watch resistant to scratches. So, if you accidentally collide with the car door while getting out, you can rest assured of your watch’s well being.

The elegant timepiece comes equipped with a leather strap, which holds the watch together apart from fastening the timepiece to your wrist. Thanks to the flexibility of the strap material, you can say goodbye to the irritation caused by other strap materials to your skin due to prolonged use. Even the fine texture of the strap material adds to the lustrous appeal of the timepiece.

Functions and Other Features

The gorgeous design of the fashionable timepiece is matched by its superlative performance. The Timex watch iswater-resistant up to a depth of 10 m and will keep running even when it is splashed with water during a heavy downpour. The Empera series Timex wristwatch makes for a brilliant way to dress up in style.

In addition, features like an analog date display that come built-in, only stress on the practicality of such a daily wear timepiece. Thanks to the presence of a small window at the 6 o’clock position, you will always be up-to-date, literally. The charm of the dainty and suave Timex Empera men's analog wristwatch will not erase off easily, and the comfy time wear will continue to entice you with its exquisite features.

node.sku: Timex BW00 Classic Analog Watch - For Men
node.description:
Timex BW00 Classic Analog Watch - For Men Price: Rs. 1,345

Looking for a watch that resembles the timepieces your father or grandfather sported back in the day? This classy analog watch is a product from Timex and it is just the accessory to have you reminiscing about the good old days that you spent vacationing at your ancestral home. The Timex analog watch for men comes from the Classic seriesand aims to be the ideal watch to wear to all those chic black tie evenings.

Body and Design

The retro designed Classic series watch from Timex comes with a stainless steel strap. The strap, apart from being extremely comfortable to wear through the entire day, is resilient against rust and other corrosive elements that would harm the watch. The length of the chain linked strap can be easily adjusted to the size of your wrist by adding or removing just the right number of links.

This Timex men’s watch also sports a gold plated case. Gold plating gives the plated material the advantages or properties of solid gold, but at a fraction of the cost. This plating material, coupled with the stainless steel back casethat is used, makes the watch extremely durable against shocks and jolts that the watch might face. The most prominent feature on the analog Timex watch is the round dial. The dial, with its vivid markings and crisp arms, give this watch its classy retro look.

Functions and Other Features

The men’s analog watch from Timex is designed to be water resistant, making it a little less of a hassle if you find yourself stranded during the monsoon season, under a big Banyan tree. The watch is also water resistant up to a depth of 30 m. This water resistant feature should have you raring to dive right into that swimming pool the next time you go to one of those resorts with family and friends.

The analog men’s watch from the Timex Classic series features a day and date display that should help you keep track of the latest sporting events and music concerts that are going on in your city. Irrespective of where you are and how you suit up, the Timex Classic analog men’s watch proves to be just the accessory to get you noticed for all the right reasons.

3-in-1 Benefits

Whether you want to pressure cook meat on those special occasions, steam vegetables for a healthy diet or make delicious curries, this pressure cooker is the right choice - it includes 3 types of lids. 

Made from Aluminium

This pressure cooker is constructed from high-quality aluminium that ensures even distribution of heat and maximum years of superior performance.

Induction Bottom

node.sku: Sandisk Cruzer Blade 16 GB Utility Pendriv(Black & Red)
node.description:
Sandisk Cruzer Blade 16 GB Utility Pendriv (Black & Red)

Port your personal data and media with ease and have it all with you at any given point in time because this SanDisk 16 GB pen drive promises a more convenient and comfortable data portability option.

SanDisk SecureAccess

While this SanDisk Cruzer Blade comes with a built in SecureAccess software, your data can be stored in highly secure password protected folders that can be created in the drive. This technology allows you to share only the folders you intend to share keeping the rest inaccessible. SecureAccess comes handy whether you are a casual user or using it for business purposes since it makes segregating data easier.

Compact design

Built in a compact, sturdy and sleek design, this drive makes it convenient and fits into your pocket and hides away with no difficulty into your bag. Carrying around information is so much simpler as compared to taking them on CD’s or DVD’s.

YuuWaa

Taking an extra step towards giving you the added advantage of storing your data more securely, this storage drive allows a 2GB data space on the cloud storage offered by YuuWaa. Saving your personal data in a central storage area not only keeps them secure but also allows you to access the data from anywhere.

Sandisk Cruzer Orbit SDCZ58-016G-B35 Pen Drive (Black) 

Crafted with unmatched quality and precision, this Sandisk Cruzer Orbit CZ58  Pen Drive offers 16 GB of generous storage space in a stylish manner.           Revolving Design            

Crafted in a revolving form, this design protects the drive’s USB connector from dust and accidental damage.

Keep it Secure

You cannot afford to lose your personal data at any given point, therefore this drive comes with the option of connecting a lanyard or a key ring to keep it from getting lost.

SanDisk Secure Access

Integrated with the SanDisk Secure Access feature, you can now protect you data from unauthorised access by password protecting your folders in the drive.

Backup and Store Files Online

Prevent your favourite music, videos, documents and other data from getting lost by creating a backup of it and storing it online.

node.sku: Delonghi EC 5 800-Watt Steam Espresso Coffee Maker
node.description:
Delonghi EC 5 800-Watt Steam Espresso Coffee Maker

Product Description

The Delonghi EC5 coffee maker brews a hot cup of refreshing espresso to energize you right at the beginning of your day. With this espresso coffee maker machine, you can make two cups of coffee at a time. It has a swivel jet frother that produces rich, creamy latte and even a cup of mocha. The aluminum water tank has enough space to hold sufficient amount of water to produce four cups of coffee. This steam-run machine has a safety cap that ensures utmost safety so that it does not open accidentally during operation.

The steam espresso coffee maker has a cappuccino system that helps in preparing thick, foaming froth by blending milk, air and steam. Moreover, the stainless steel body of the coffee maker is very easy to clean. Large removable drip trays make it more effortless to clean every corner of the machine. With the indicator light and projected on/off switch, this espresso coffee maker is very easy to control too. You can easily adjust the steam emission to prevent any accidental damage. Its heat-resistant technology also makes it very user-friendly.

  • Colour: Black
  • Material: Stainless steel and aluminum
  • Weight: 1.6kg
  • Power Consumption: 800W
  • 2-cup adaptor
  • Safe and easy operation

  • Cappuccino system for a delicious, creamy froth
  • Dimensions: 30.5 x 25.5 x 30 cm

node.sku: Premier Stainless Steel Cookware - Milk Boiler (2 Litre)
node.description:
Specification

Premier Stainless Steel Cookware combine high-grade stainless steel with superior design features that ensure faster and more efficient and more elegant cooking options. Stringent quality control and conformation to product specifications ensure cookware that matches international standards not just in quality but also in design. The size, shape and beauty of the stainless steel medium allow for many attractive cookware options that combine to make Premier Stainless Steel Cookware with look and style that meet the demands of the millennium.

  • 2 Litre Milk Boiler

  • It is good for boiling milk without the need to watch over the milk boiling over the stove.

  • Add milk in cooker and allow it to 'whistle' for a few minutes

node.short_description:
CAPACITY 2 Litres
MATERIAL Stainless Steel
WARRANTY SUMMARY 2 years Manufacturing Warranty

node.sku: Premier Stainless Steel Cookware - Milk Boiler (1.5 Litre)
node.description: Add water to the milk boiler by unscrewing the whistle. Fill the water in the boiler. Do not overfill the boiler, overfill will result in water spilling out of the whistle while boiling milk. Screw in the whistle to the milk boiler. Keep the boiler on a stove and pour milk in it. Do not heat the boiler without any milk. Water is heated first and then the heat is transferred from the water to the milk. The double boiler design limits the overflow of milk. This ensures that the milk is heated slowly and thoroughly without the risk of burning.

Non-stick Tawas are modern, user friendly and require less cooking oil for cooking. They are made from the finest quality food grade aluminum which ensures safe cooking and longevity. node.sku: Sony Xperia E3
node.description:
• Sony Xperia E3 dual has a 4.5-inch TFT display and runs Android 4.4 KitKat
  • The device is powered by 1.2GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 chipset and 1GB RAM
  • It has 4GB of internal storage which is further expandable up to 32GB
  • Xperia E3 dual has a 5MP rear camera with LED flash and a VGA front camera
  • The connectivity features include dual SIM, Wi-Fi, 4G, 3G, GPS, Bluetooth
  • The smartphone is backed by a 2330mAh non-removable battery
node.name: Sony Xperia E3 (Dual SIM, White)
node.short_description:
Sony Xperia E3 Mobile Phone Information

The Xperia E3 Dual boasts a 4.5-inch IPS display with a 480x854 pixel resolution. The Android 4.4 KitKat based handset also houses a 5-megapixel rear camera along with a bunch of Sony's exclusive photo and video editing apps, including features like HDR and Timeshift burst. It also has a front-facing VGA camera.

A 1.2 GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 processor powers the handset, coupled with 1GB of RAM and Adreno 305 GPU. It comes with a 4GB of built-in storage, further expandable up to 32GB via microSD card.

One of the new features introduced in the Xperia E3 is the shake to start app which enable users to customize shortcuts to access their favorite apps by simply holding the handset and flicking the wrist.

The connectivity options on the Xperia E3 Dual include dual SIM, 4G LTE, 3G, GPRS/ EDGE, Wi-Fi, A-GPS with Glonass, USB 2.0, FM radio with RDS, Bluetooth 4.0, and a 3.5mm universal jack.

The Xperia E3 Dual weighs 143.8 grams, and measures 137.1x69.4x8.5mm. It is backed by a 2330mAh battery which is touted to deliver up to 12 hours 20 minutes of talk time, and up to 706 hours of standby time. The phone is available in four different colors Lime, Copper, White and Black.

node.sku: Sony Xperia T3FOLLOW SpecsRivals
node.description:
DESCRIPTION

The Sony Xperia T3 has IPS-LCD Triluminos screen with 720x1280 pixels resolution. The processing power is a bit on the slow side for today's standards, as the phone gets powered by a 1.4 GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 processor, but this is the new midrange now, and it looks pretty svelte with the 150.7 x 77 x 7 mm chassis, built around a stainless steel frame. The memory situation includes 1 GB of RAM, 8 GB of internal storage, and a microSD slot that takes up to 32 GB cards. There is an 8 MP Exmor RS sensor on the back for snapping and 1080p video purposes, and a 1.1 MP front-facing camera that does 720p recordings. Power is provided by a 2500 mAh battery. Naturally, Android 4.4 KitKat with Sony's own Xperia UI are loaded on the handset, too.

node.sku: Premier Stainless Steel Cookware - Idly Stand 6 Plates
node.description:
Stainless Steel 6 Plates Idly Stand Premier Stainless Steel Cookware combine high-grade stainless steel with superior design features that ensure faster and more efficient and more elegant cooking options.

Stringent quality control and conformation to product specifications ensure cookware that matches international standards not just in quality but also in design.

The size, shape and beauty of the stainless steel medium allow for many attractive cookware options that combine to make Premier Stainless Steel Cookware with look and style that meet the demands of the millennium.

Premier Stainless Steel 4 Plate Idly Stand To make authentic idlis, one needs the idli stand.

This idli stand has four round tiers, 10 inches in diameter.

Each tier has four concave depressions where the idli batter is poured.

The trays are stacked and secured through a center rod, then placed in its covered pot with just enough boiling water to keep the bottom tray dry."

node.sku: PREMIER LPG STOVE GT SS MANUAL 2GX
node.description:
A Functional beauty for your exclusive Lifestyle Presenting the stunning range of Premier Glass Top Gas Stoves Our range of world-class finely crafted Glass Top Gas Stoves offer you a complete package of style, functionality and design, which are truly aspirational lifestyle products and offers true value by virtue of being highly efficient and stunning.

Features TIPS TO USE

1.When using smaller vessels, reduce the flame intensity to the minimum.

2.Use large sized vessels for high flame to cover the entire flame to avoid wastage of gas. After desired cooking level is attained, it is sufficient to keep the flame intensity to a minimum level to maintain the temperature.

Do's and Don'ts

1.Use the gas stove for cooking purpose only. Don't dry the kitchen towels, clothes over it. Always use LPG that comes in a cylinder from an authorized supplier.

2.Connect the gas stove to the cylinder with Premier Suraksha LPG hose or equivalent. Don't use vinyl or plastic tube.

3.Check the LPG hose periodically for any wear and tear to avoid gas leak and prevent accidents. It must be replaced every two years.

4.Make sure the LPG hose is away from the gas stove or any hot surface because it is susceptible to burst.

5.Don't keep inflammables near gas stove.

6.Avoid touching the pan supports when in use to avoid burns. Wash the pan supports in water and dry it thoroughly before replacing over the burner.

7.Clean the burners periodically so that they don't get clogged. Do not use abrasive materials or chemicals for cleaning. Use a wire brush to clean the burner holes, if you clean with water make sure that you dry them properly before putting it to use.

node.sku: PREMIER LIFESTYLE WET GRINDER
node.description:
Premier lifestyle wet grinders are designed for modern households that look for comfort quotient to suit their lifestyle.

•It is attractive, convenient, light and sleek grinder that can complement any lifestyle and kitchen.

•Detachable stainless steel grinding vessel is easy to clean. The drum has a stone bottom to give that authentic taste you get only from stone on stone grinding. It lets you clean dough from the roller stones easily and effortlessly.

•The all new geared motor is so quiet and powerful that you can operate the unit stable and hassle free.

•The modern stainless steel drum and granite roller stones last even after 10 years of use.

•It helps you prepare soft and wonderful idlies, crispy vadas and crunchy dosas.

•These tilting tabletop grinders are not just multi-purpose but are also ideal for multi-ethnic food preparation and to create exotic dishes with ease. The Premier Wet Grinders also comes with a 1 year overall warranty and 5 years warranty on motor.
